name: Waza National Park
address: Near Waza town, Far North Region
description: Cameroon's premier wildlife park with elephants, lions and cheetahs.

name: Limbe
description: Coastal town with black sand beaches and primate rescue center.

name: Mount Cameroon
description: West Africa's tallest peak (4,040m) and active volcano with rainforests, savannahs and lava fields.

name: Dja Faunal Reserve
description: UNESCO rainforest reserve with gorillas and forest elephants.

name: Bamenda Highlands
description: Mountainous region with crater lakes and waterfalls.

name: Kribi
description: Beach town with white sand and ocean waterfalls.

name: Foumban
description: Cultural capital of the Bamoun Kingdom with royal palace.

name: Ring Road
description: Scenic route through traditional villages and landscapes.
